    • Field Detail

      • GLOBAL_INSPECTION

        public static final ExtensionPointName<InspectionEP> GLOBAL_INSPECTION
        See Also:
        GlobalInspectionTool

      • shortName

        public java.lang.String shortName
        Usually generated automatically from FQN. Must be unique among all inspections.

        Short name is used in two cases: \inspectionDescriptions\<short_name>.html resource may contain short inspection description to be shown in "Inspect Code..." dialog and also provide some file name convention when using offline inspection or export to HTML function.

      • key

        public java.lang.String key
        Message key for displayName.
        See Also:
        bundle

      • bundle

        public java.lang.String bundle
        Message bundle, e.g. "messages.InspectionsBundle". If unspecified, plugin's <resource-bundle> is used.
        See Also:
        key

      • displayName

        public java.lang.String displayName
        Non-localized display name used in UI (Settings|Editor|Inspections and "Inspection Results" tool window). Use key for I18N.

      • groupKey

        public java.lang.String groupKey
        Message key for groupDisplayName.
        See Also:
        groupBundle

      • groupBundle

        public java.lang.String groupBundle
        Message bundle, e.g. "messages.InspectionsBundle". If unspecified, will use bundle, then plugin's <resource-bundle> as fallback.
        See Also:
        groupKey

      • groupDisplayName

        public java.lang.String groupDisplayName
        Non-localized group display name used in UI (Settings|Editor|Inspections). Use groupKey for I18N.

      • groupPath

        public java.lang.String groupPath
        Comma-delimited list of parent group names (excluding groupName) used in UI (Settings|Editor|Inspections), e.g. "Java,Java language level migration aids".

      • enabledByDefault

        public boolean enabledByDefault

      • applyToDialects

        public boolean applyToDialects
        Whether this inspection should be applied to dialects of specified language.
        See Also:
        Language.getDialects()

      • cleanupTool

        public boolean cleanupTool
        If true, the inspection can run as part of the code cleanup action.

      • level

        public java.lang.String level
        Highlighting level for this inspection tool that is used in default settings, e.g. "INFO", "ERROR".
        See Also:
        HighlightDisplayLevel

      • hasStaticDescription

        public boolean hasStaticDescription
        Whether inspection's description should use InspectionProfileEntry.getStaticDescription().

      • presentation

        public java.lang.String presentation
        See Also:
        InspectionToolPresentation

      • isInternal

        public boolean isInternal
        Do not show internal inspections if IDE internal mode is off.
